Leaves: Alternately arranged, 2-5 cm long, bright green, deeply divided into 3 or more segments, slightly succulent.
Flowers: Cream to white with 5 petals, solitary, about 2.5 cm diameter, on stalks up to 5 cm long.
FruitSeeds: Rounded, flattened capsules 7-12 mm diameter with blunt tip, with 3 cells, opening at tip, containing 45-60 brown to black pyramid-shaped seeds.
Impacts: Outcompetes with native vegetation, unpalatable and toxic in high doses.
